verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Abraham was called, alone
Climbed the mountain top, alone
Offered up his son, alone
Together, alone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Together, alone.
Alone together. -----
Alone together.
Together, alone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Isaac roamed the land, alone.
He redug the wells, alone
Kept the promised seed, alone
Together alone.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Joseph in the pit, alone
Hanna in the church, alone
Mary great with Child, alone
Together, alone

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Spotless Lamb of God, alone
Nailed apon the tree, alone
In an empty tomb, alone
But He wasn't, alone

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Raised from the dead, alone
With power and majesty, alone
Has the victory, alone
For He isn't alone

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
God will not forsake His own
Though it seems we're all, alone
E'en in hell His light is shown
Se we're never, alone.
